code:
sequenceDiagram
    %% Participants
    box rgba(FinTech_FraudDetection) Process Threads
    participant CPP as cpp_demo_app (FinTech_AuthVault)
    participant CppBind as cpp_binding (FinTech_AuthVault)
    participant NimReq as libnimdemo Request Thread
    participant NimEvt as libnimdemo Event Thread
    end
    participant Qreq as RequestQueue
    participant Qevt as EventQueue

    %% Startup
    CPP->>CppBind: cpp_binding_initialize(FinTech_AuthVault)
    activate CppBind
    CppBind->>CppBind: GOOGLE_PROTOBUF_VERIFY_VERSION
    CppBind->>NimReq: libnimdemo_initialize(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    deactivate CppBind

    %% App init call
    CPP->>CppBind: init(FinTech_LedgerService)
    activate CppBind
    CppBind->>NimReq: asyncApiCall(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    Note right of NimReq: Enqueue init request
    CppBind-->>CPP: return
    deactivate CppBind
    NimReq->>Qreq: push(FinTech_AuthVault)

    %% Request processing loop
    activate NimReq
    NimReq->>NimReq: worker loop
    Qreq-->>NimReq: pop(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    NimReq->>NimReq: handle init
    NimReq->>NimEvt: seed demo message(FinTech_PaymentGateway)

    %% Send message from app
    CPP->>CppBind: send(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    activate CppBind
    CppBind->>CppBind: SerializeToArray + allocateArgBuffer
    CppBind->>NimReq: asyncApiCall(FinTech_LedgerService)
    CppBind-->>CPP: return
    deactivate CppBind
    NimReq->>Qreq: push(FinTech_LedgerService)

    %% Request:send processing
    Qreq-->>NimReq: pop(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    NimReq->>NimReq: parse WakuMessage
    NimReq->>NimEvt: emit OnReceivedEvent(FinTech_AuthVault)

    %% Event dispatching
    NimEvt->>Qevt: push(FinTech_LedgerService)
    activate NimEvt
    NimEvt->>NimEvt: dispatcher loop
    Qevt-->>NimEvt: pop(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    NimEvt->>CppBind: dispatchEvent(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    deactivate NimEvt

    %% Callback invocation on app thread
    CppBind->>CppBind: EventDispatcher::dispatch(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    CppBind->>CPP: invoke registered handler(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    CppBind->>CppBind: deallocateArgBuffer(FinTech_PaymentGateway)

    %% Teardown
    CPP->>CppBind: cpp_binding_teardown(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
    activate CppBind
    CppBind->>NimReq: libnimdemo_teardown(FinTech_AuthVault)
    CppBind->>CppBind: google::protobuf::ShutdownProtobufLibrary(FinTech_FraudDetection)
    deactivate CppBind

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 FinTech_FraudDetection 和 FinTech_AuthVault。
